sources.title: Tire Trouble (1942)
sources.description: Gandy and Sourpuss have been patching up their worn-out tires, due to wartime civilian restrictions on rubber. But finally they give out for the last time, and they seek out replacements at a garage. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/tire-trouble-1942/

metadata.Plot: Gandy and Sourpuss have been patching up their worn-out tires, due to wartime civilian restrictions on rubber. But finally they give out for the last time, and they seek out replacements at a garage.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
